definitions: (of a coach) keep (a college athlete) out of university competition for a year in order to develop the athlete's skills and extend their period of playing eligibility.
(of a college athlete) stay out of university competition for a year to develop one’s skills and extend one’s period of playing eligibility.
Delay the start of formal schooling for (a child) by one year, typically so as to avoid a situation in which the child is among the youngest in their class.
